long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a supplement extension to the www.worth-reading.org website. This extension allows you to highlight the web content you find interesting and send it quickly to your subscribers on worth-reading.org. 

Directions for use:
1) Highlight text
2) Click Worth Reading icon (icon with letters "WR") on the top-right of your browser.
3) New tab is opened up on chrome taking you to the Worth Reading website with your selected text in a form ready to be sent to your subscribers or friends.
